reviewText: Lots of fun movies I saw when growing up.  I really love this collection.
Many good movies. Would highly recommend.
Amazing...now looking at the movies and enjoying them very much!

Don't make popcorn during the movie! There are enough movies that you can wait for your popcorn between the shows. You will not want to pause, or a greater sin of,  just missing 3-5 minutes DURING a movie!  There are movies you remember or you remember that you missed when they came out, either way, here they are so prepare turn off the phone, get your beverage, and . . .  Oh yea! pop the corn then start the movie. Enjoy!
